sentences.english: Adenoid cystic carcinoma is one of the common malignant tumors in oral and maxillofacialsalivary glands.
sentences.chinese: 腺樣囊性癌多發生於涎腺，是常見的惡性腫瘤。

sentences.english: For instance, some people must eliminate allergens or have enlarged adenoids removed.
sentences.chinese: 例如，有些人必須消除過敏原或擴大腺樣刪除。
